title: #138: Black Friday (@JCAlvarado1, @MatEdgar)
itunes:title: Black Friday with Mat Edgar and Juan Carlos Alvarado
description: Juan Carlos Alvarado met me at a secluded beach in Los Cabos, Mexico and we did a podcast about poker. We talked some about how he became a professional poker player, how he deals with losing streaks, and what his family thought of it all. And then we went into Black Friday and the end of the golden age of online poker. Mat Edgar helps me with the intro and outro, too.
